attributes.action: GET RID OF THE BIASED PARADES COMMISSION
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call on ALL Unionist Parties to set aside their differences and have an Emergency meeting to discuss the Abolishment of the Corrupt and Biased Parades Commission.
This Biased organisation are hightening Sectarian Tensions in Northern Ireland with their crazy decisions and rewarding Violent Republicans whilst punishing Law Abiding Loyalist Bands and The Loyal Orders.
This should be done as a matter of Urgency with The First Minister Of Northern Ireland in Attendance.
This Continuous Erosion of our Culture must end now.
Appathy within our culture will see us wiped out if everyone sits back and accepts it.
United We Stand, Divided We Fall.
